projects.title: Back Propagation
projects.description: Back Propagation implemented in C++ with CUDA with no external libraries
details: Optimized CUDA kernels to train multilayer perceptrons without relying on external math libraries.
Implements momentum, weight decay, and configurable activation functions to experiment with convergence.
Includes benchmarking harness and visual metrics for monitoring training progress.

projects.title: Ray Tracing
projects.description: Ray Tracing implemented in C++ and includes a GUI
details: Physically based renderer with reflections, refractions, and soft shadows.
Interactive desktop GUI for controlling camera, material presets, and render targets.
Supports scene import/export using a lightweight JSON description format.

media.alt: Ray traced render of reflective spheres

projects.title: 1brc
projects.description: Parsing text in Java 38x faster than the baseline
details: Lock-free data ingestion pipeline that shards work across CPU cores.
SIMD-accelerated parsing routines tuned with JMH benchmarks.
Integrates flight recorder telemetry for profiling throughput bottlenecks.

projects.title: Learn Linear Algebra
projects.description: A website with detailed notes for Georgia Tech's Linear Algebra
details: Modular lessons with interactive practice problems and spaced repetition prompts.
Streamlined layouts optimized for mobile and screen readers.
Backend pipeline renders LaTeX notes, quizzes, and solution walkthroughs.
